channel.title: 齐林的博客
channel.description: Recent content on 齐林的博客

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Lin Qi ,and I graduated from Shanghai Jiao Tong University, with a Master’s degree of Engineering in 2018. My current location is Shanghai, in China. On the web and with friends, I am also known as "larryqi", which has been my nickname since a long time ago. You should probably also know that I do not have a sleep schedule, which means that I am usually awake whenever there is work to do.

item.title: How to improve your listening
item.description: How to imporove your listening in English Watch movies or T.V. first time use your native language subtitle then change it to English subtitle Watch without subtitle Listen to music not to learn grammar lyric Go out go out to the country where people communicate in English. listen to people talking make friends with foreigner
